title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: HBAR Jumps 17%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) joined Hedera (HBAR) as a top performer, gaining 13%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3878.91, up 3.6% (+133.71) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Thirteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: HBAR (+17.0%) and LTC (+13.0%).

Laggards: ETH (-3.4%) and UNI (-1.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 3.6% with 13 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in HBAR (+17.0%) and LTC (+13.0%).
